subject: Baseball
Homosexuality and Bisexuality
lead_paragraph: Murphy, who is outspoken about his Christian beliefs, told The Star-Ledger of Newark that he was ready to play alongside an openly gay teammate but disagreed “100 percent” with homosexuality.
snippet: Murphy, who is outspoken about his Christian beliefs, told The Star-Ledger of Newark that he was ready to play alongside an openly gay teammate but disagreed “100 percent” with homosexuality.
